extendedDescription: 'Has replies' is the only filter that works if not signed in with the script. A 'Following' filter becomes available if you do.

description: $forumMedia_description
extendedDescription: The forum preview only shows one tag by default, so it's just going to say 'anime' or 'manga' without telling you which media it's about. This module adds a second tag, shortening the title somewhat if there's not enough space.

A baseline for adjusting Anilist to act more like a native RTL language site would.
Not complete.

description: Do not load images on the low bandwidth feed
extendedDescription:
Refers to the feed located at https://anilist.co/terms if the setting 'low bandwidth feed' is turned on.
For very slow connections, images are going to be the most difficult part of the page to load.
See if your addblocker also supports setting a size limit for media, which may help if you are struggling.

$settings_partialLocalisationLanguage_description
extendedDescription:
Partial localisation, translates Automail-specific elements.
Check "Translate additional parts of the Anilist UI" for translating more fo the site.
For Japanese, you may also want to change your title language at https://anilist.co/settings/media

Want to contribute? See: https://github.com/hohMiyazawa/Automail/issues/69
